enb_long_title: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change: Twenty-Second Session of the Subsidiary Bodies
section_title: MATTERS RELATING TO THE LEAST DEVELOPED COUNTRIES
sentences: Following lengthy negotiations throughout the day (see the 'Contact Groups and Informal Consultations' section, below), SBI adopted the conclusions (FCCC/SBI/2005/L.14) and agreed to recommend the draft decision to COP 11 (FCCC/SBI/2005/L.14/Add.1).
Bangladesh, for the LDCs, noted that the final text was not LDCs` preferred outcome, but that they had compromised.
He said it is now up to the GEF to operationalize the guidance in a way that truly responds to the need to implement the NAPAs.
